Will Sweet

Exploring catalysts of technology, business, and behavior

My name is Will Sweet. I’m the Founder and CEO of Shef, an efficient meal planning app for home cooks.

This site features my thoughts on business, strategy, technology and behavior, as well as my experiences as a founder. If anything I write interests you, reach out to me through twitter at the link below.

⋅ ⋅ ⋅

Recent Books: Work Rules!, Shoe Dog, Steve Jobs, In the Plex, and The Everything Store.

Favorite Podcasts: Exponent, Acquired, How I Built This, How to Start a Startup, Startup School Radio, and the a16z Podcast.

Disclaimer: For better or worse, all thoughts are my own.
